tacoTap.title: Taco Tap
tacoTap.shortDescription: A completely front end website that uses google and weather api's to find the best taco place near you.

binge.title: Binge
binge.shortDescription: This is a full stack application that allows users to add their favorite tv shows, movies and music to their profile. The data is saved in a mysql database and the user can update their entries.

basketBistro.title: Basket Bistro
basketBistro.shortDescription: Full Stack application built to simplify the process of preparing their shopping list based on the recipes they want to cook.
